trans-unit.source: Represents a layout control that aligns a bullet and another visual object.
trans-unit.target: Representa um controlo de esquema alinhar uma marca e o outro objeto visual.

trans-unit.source: BulletDecorator has two content properties: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator.Bullet%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator.Child%2A>.
trans-unit.target: BulletDecorator tem duas propriedades conteúdas: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator.Bullet%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator.Child%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator.Child%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator.Bullet%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator.Bullet%2A> property defines the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> to use as a bullet.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator.Bullet%2A>propriedade define o <xref:System.Windows.UIElement>para utilizar como uma marca.</xref:System.Windows.UIElement> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator.Bullet%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator.Child%2A> property defines a <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> that visually aligns with the bullet.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator.Child%2A>propriedade define um <xref:System.Windows.UIElement>que visualmente está alinhada com a marca.</xref:System.Windows.UIElement> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator.Child%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator.Bullet%2A> always aligns with the first line of text when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator.Child%2A> object is a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator.Bullet%2A>sempre está alinhada com a primeira linha de texto quando o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator.Child%2A>objeto é <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator.Child%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator.Bullet%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator.Child%2A> object is not a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock>, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator.Bullet%2A> aligns to the center of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator.Child%2A> object.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator.Child%2A>o objeto não é um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock>, a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator.Bullet%2A>alinha para o centro do <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator.Child%2A>objeto.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator.Child%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator.Bullet%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator.Child%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about layout of a BulletDecorator, see [How to: Create a BulletDecorator](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/d9532e9a-a2a5-47b9-aa37-c36f841b34ae).
trans-unit.target: Para mais informações sobre o esquema de uma BulletDecorator, consulte [como: criar um BulletDecorator](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/d9532e9a-a2a5-47b9-aa37-c36f841b34ae).

trans-unit.source: The following illustration shows examples of BulletDecorator controls.
trans-unit.target: A ilustração seguinte mostra exemplos de BulletDecorator controlos.

trans-unit.source: ![3 BulletDecorators: CheckBox, RadioButton, TextBox](~/add/media/bulletdecorator.png "3 BulletDecorators: CheckBox, RadioButton, TextBox")
trans-unit.target: ![3 BulletDecorators: caixa de texto da caixa de verificação, RadioButton,](~/add/media/bulletdecorator.png "3 BulletDecorators: caixa de verificação, RadioButton, caixa de texto")

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Overrides the default content arrangement behavior for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Substitui o comportamento de disposição de conteúdo predefinido para o <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator"> </xref> controlo.

trans-unit.source: The ArrangeOverride method determines the size and position of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator.Bullet%2A> and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator.Child%2A> objects.
trans-unit.target: O método ArrangeOverride determina o tamanho e posição do <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator.Bullet%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator.Child%2A>objetos.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator.Child%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator.Bullet%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator.Bullet%2A> is aligned vertically with the first line of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator.Child%2A> content.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator.Bullet%2A>está alinhada verticalmente com a primeira linha do <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator.Child%2A>conteúdo.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator.Child%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator.Bullet%2A>

trans-unit.source: The available <xref href="System.Windows.Size"></xref> to use to lay out the content of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Disponíveis <xref href="System.Windows.Size"> </xref> a utilizar para apresentar o conteúdo a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator"> </xref> controlo.

trans-unit.source: The computed size of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: O tamanho do calculada a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator"> </xref> controlo.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the background color for a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a cor de fundo de uma <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator"> </xref> controlo.

trans-unit.source: The Background property defines the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Brush> to use to fill the area within the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator>.
trans-unit.target: Define a propriedade de em segundo plano a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Brush>utilizar para preencher a área de <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Brush>

trans-unit.source: For some parent layout elements, the area that is defined for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator> may extend beyond its <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator.Bullet%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator.Child%2A> content.
trans-unit.target: Em alguns elementos de esquema principal, a área que é definida para o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator>pode se estendam para além respetivo <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator.Bullet%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator.Child%2A>conteúdo.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator.Child%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator.Bullet%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator>

trans-unit.source: For example, if the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator> is the single child of a cell in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Grid> control, the Background property applies to the whole cell.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, se o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator>é o único subordinado de uma célula num <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Grid>controlo, a propriedade de fundo aplica-se à célula toda.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Grid> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator>

trans-unit.source: This occurs because the content in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Grid> cell is stretched in all directions to fill the cell, by default.
trans-unit.target: Isto ocorre porque o conteúdo de um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Grid>célula é stretched (ampliada) em todas as instruções para preencher a célula, por predefinição.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Grid>

trans-unit.source: However, if you set the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A> property to <xref:System.Windows.VerticalAlignment> for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator>, the Background property only affects the actual content area of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator>.
trans-unit.target: No entanto, se definir a <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A>propriedade para <xref:System.Windows.VerticalAlignment>o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator>a propriedade de fundo afeta apenas a área de conteúdo real do <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator> </xref:System.Windows.VerticalAlignment> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A>

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, you can enclose the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator> in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel> element.
trans-unit.target: Em alternativa, pode incluir o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator>num <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel>elemento.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator>

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|, |
trans-unit.target: # # Informações de propriedade de dependência ||| |-|-| | Campo Identificador | | | Definir propriedades de metadados `true`|, |

trans-unit.source: The background color for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator.Bullet*> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator.Child*> of a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A cor de fundo para a <> </> *> e <> </> *> de um <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator.Background*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator.Background*>propriedade de dependência.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator.Background*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the object to use as the bullet in a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o objeto a utilizar como marca num <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The Bullet property is a content property of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator> control and defines the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> to display as a bullet for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator.Child%2A> object.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade de marca é uma propriedade de conteúdo a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator>controlar e define o <xref:System.Windows.UIElement>a apresentar como uma marca de para o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator.Child%2A>objeto.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator.Child%2A> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator>

trans-unit.source: The bullet that is defined by setting the Bullet property to a <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> is the first visual element in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator> control.
trans-unit.target: A marca é definida ao definir a propriedade de marca como um <xref:System.Windows.UIElement>é o primeiro elemento visual num <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator>controlo.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement>

trans-unit.source: The single <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator.Child%2A> element is the second visual element.
trans-unit.target: A única <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator.Child%2A>elemento é o segundo elemento visual.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator.Child%2A>

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Property Element Usage ``` ```
trans-unit.target: # # Utilização de elemento de propriedade de XAML``` ```

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref> to use as the bullet.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"> </xref> para utilizar como a marca.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the child element that is at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o elemento subordinado do que é no índice especificado.

trans-unit.source: The visual child elements of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator> are the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator.Bullet%2A> and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator.Child%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Os elementos subordinados visual de um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator>são o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator.Bullet%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator.Child%2A>Propriedades.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator.Child%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator.Bullet%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator>

trans-unit.source: The specified index for the child element.
trans-unit.target: O índice especificado para o elemento subordinado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"></xref> child element that is at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"> </xref> elemento subordinado que esteja no índice especificado.

trans-unit.source: index is less than 0.
trans-unit.target: indexé menor que 0.

trans-unit.source: -or- index is greater than or equal to .
trans-unit.target: - ou - index é maior que ou igual a .

trans-unit.source: Gets an enumerator for the logical child elements of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um enumerador para o subordinado lógico de elementos do <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator"> </xref> controlo.

trans-unit.source: The logical child elements for a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator> control include the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator.Bullet%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator.Child%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Os elementos subordinados lógico para um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator>controlo incluem o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator.Bullet%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator.Child%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator.Child%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator.Bullet%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator>

trans-unit.source: If you set both properties, they are enumerated in the following order: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator.Bullet%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator.Child%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Se definir ambas as propriedades, são enumerados na seguinte ordem: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator.Bullet%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator.Child%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator.Child%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator.Bullet%2A>

trans-unit.source: The number of visual child elements is the same as the number of logical child elements.
trans-unit.target: O número de elementos subordinados visual é igual ao número de elementos subordinados lógico.

trans-unit.source: The enumerator that provides access to the logical child elements of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: O enumerador que fornece acesso aos elementos subordinados de lógica do <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator"> </xref> controlo.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Overrides the default measurement behavior for the objects of a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Substitui o comportamento de medida predefinida para os objetos de uma <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator"> </xref> controlo.

trans-unit.source: The upper <xref href="System.Windows.Size"></xref> limit of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O limite superior <xref href="System.Windows.Size"> </xref> limite a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The required <xref href="System.Windows.Size"></xref> for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator"></xref> control, based on the size of its <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator.Bullet*> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator.Child*> objects.
trans-unit.target: Necessários <xref href="System.Windows.Size"> </xref> para o <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator"> </xref> controlo, com base no tamanho do respetivo <> </> *> e <> </> *> objetos.

trans-unit.source: Renders the content of a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Compõe o conteúdo de um <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator"> </xref> controlo.

trans-unit.source: This method creates a <xref:System.Windows.Rect> structure that is sized for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator> content.
trans-unit.target: Este método cria uma <xref:System.Windows.Rect>estrutura que é o tamanho para o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator>conteúdo.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator> </xref:System.Windows.Rect>

trans-unit.source: This rectangular structure is displayed with the specified <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator.Background%2A> color and no border.
trans-unit.target: Esta estrutura retangular é apresentada com especificado <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator.Background%2A>cor e sem limite.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator.Background%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.DrawingContext"></xref> for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.DrawingContext"></xref> for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of visual child elements for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o número de elementos subordinados visual para o <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator"> </xref> controlo.

trans-unit.source: The VisualChildrenCount can be 0, 1, or 2.
trans-unit.target: O VisualChildrenCount pode ser 0, 1 ou 2.

trans-unit.source: If either the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator.Bullet%2A> or a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator.Child%2A> element is defined, the VisualChildrenCount is 1.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator.Bullet%2A>ou um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator.Child%2A>elemento está definido, o VisualChildrenCount é 1.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator.Child%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator.Bullet%2A>

trans-unit.source: If both the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator.Bullet%2A> and a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator.Child%2A> element are defined, the VisualChildrenCount is 2.
trans-unit.target: Se ambas as <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator.Bullet%2A>e um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator.Child%2A>elemento são definidos, a VisualChildrenCount é 2.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator.Child%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator.Bullet%2A>

trans-unit.source: The number of visual child elements is the same as the number of logical child elements.
trans-unit.target: O número de elementos subordinados visual é igual ao número de elementos subordinados lógico.

trans-unit.source: The number of visual elements that are defined for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O número de elementos visuais que estão definidos para o <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is 0.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é 0.
